Package org.apache.polygene.api.concern

Concern API.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ConcernDescriptor
    Concern descriptor.
    ConcernsDescriptor
    Concerns descriptor.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConcernOf<T>
    Base class for Concerns.
    GenericConcern
    Base class for generic Concerns.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    Concerns
    This annotation is used by composites and mixins to declare what Concerns should be applied to the type or specific method.
